name: Infinity Snake
description:
MOBILE LINK: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=565d6c59cc4db437aeda8ae262b20755

Press space or X to start the game

WASD/Arrow keys to move

R Retry

TIP: Hold a direction to move fast, or repeatedly tap to go even faster!

Made in three hours for FNGJ #2020-42 Theme: Infinity
